Text: The game is in english. I have Windows 7 64bit and this game works fine

works good for me on win7 64 bits, easy to install, just follow the intructions.

big up for this torrent, ive been looking for it since long ago !

http://www.gamefront.com/files/20438046/WitE+Public+Beta+Patch+v1.04.28.rar This newest patch includes all previous patches

To install Gary Grigsby's War in the East: The German-Soviet War 1941-1945

1. First, create your own personal serial number like this:

XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX

( X is a number between 1 to 9 (both included) never 0)

2. run "install.bat" inside "gameWitE" and give serial 

3. run "install.bat" in "WitE Public Beta Patch v1.04.28" and give serial 

4. Play game

This works a treat, but double-click the bat files. I first tried Right-Click|Run As Administrator and then Right-Click|Open and neither worked.

Repeat: Double-click the bat files and it works a treat.

THANK YOU *GEVD*. I never expected to see this in a torrent. 

PS Any chance of the latest patch (currently 1.04.36)?
